remarks: Distributive law for the scalar product of a complex vector space. (Contributed by NM, 4-Dec-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvdi.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvdi.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
nvdi.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
nvdir $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A + B ) S C ) = ( ( A S C ) G ( B S C ) ) ) $.
